name: The Four Paths
description:
Summary


The Four Paths is a strategy game where each campaign is unique because in each adventure you'll discover new stories, abilities, relics and opponents.
Overcome each challenge and discover all the endings that The Four Paths offers.

Strategic Battles


Read your opponents' feelings, spend your mana strategically, follow your feelings, choose the best skills in each situation and claim victory.

Features:


More than 50 skills.

More than 10 finals.

More than 20 relics.

A nice story.

Some books.

Minigames.
